item.title: Welcome to akenji's lab!
item.author: akenji.1118@gmail.com (Kenji Arai)
item.description: Hi, my name is Kenji Arai. I am a systems engineer. I am interested in computers especially HPC domain, and astronomy, and I write here about what I’ve learned. If you’re interested, I’d like you to read it.
